programme.desc: Azura, seorang gadis remaja yang gigih hadapi cabaran hidup untuk mencapai cita-citanya. Dia tinggal bersama ibu saudaranya setelah kedua ibu bapanya meninggal dunia dalam satu tragedi. Azura kemudiannya menjadi mahasiswa di sebuah universiti swasta dan menjalinkan hubungan mesra dengan Zek, seorang anak hartawan. Walau bagaimanapun, cinta mereka dihalang oleh bapa Zek dan mereka terpaksa melalui pelbagai dugaan.

programme.title: Femina
programme.desc: Perjuangan untuk mendapatkan hak setara antara jantina terutamanya wanita lantang dibicarakan di dalam majalah Femina. Tina, tegas memperjuangkan pendiriannya manakala Anita tidak berapa menyukai cara Tina. Femina telah menjadi satu platform anti-lelaki. Pertemuan Tina bersama Pyan mula mengubah pandangan ekstrem Tina namun perasaan dilema mula menguasai diri apabila dituduh sebagai pembelot wanita.

programme.title: XX Ray
programme.desc: Obsesinya terhadap angkasa lepas telah membuatkan Amir untuk mencipta sebuah topi keledar. Topi keledar ini merupakan penemuan baru apabila ia menggunakan kuasa tahi bintang. Sesiapa sahaja yang memakainya boleh melihat menembusi apa sahaja yang mereka inginkan. Kekacauan berlaku apabila topi itu telah menyebabkan Amir bertukar menjadi halimunan.

programme.title: XX Ray 2
programme.desc: Bekerja sebagai saintis kadet, Tina berasa ditipu apabila Johan mendakwa dia yang mencipta mesin pelupusan laser walhal ia merupakan hasil cetusan idea dari Tina. Ingin menghalang niat jahat Johan, Tina meminta bantuan Amir. Namun, keduanya terkena pancaran laser mesin itu dalam cubaan untuk menghalang Johan dan telah dihantar ke zaman Kesultanan Melayu Melaka.

programme.title: Puteri Impian 2
programme.desc: Gadis kilang yang menolak lamaran seorang kerabat diraja Tengku Faizal, menaruh hati terhadap jurukamera stesen televisyen, Zul. Nora menyukai Zul tetapi dia telah pun menjalin hubungan bersama Lisa. Adik kepada Tengku Faizal, Tengku Farid ingin membawa semula Nora kembali ke abangnya. Tekad, dia ingin mengangkat semula maruah abangnya.

programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin Remaja
programme.desc: Pasangan remaja yang bakal menduduki peperiksaan SPM, Amir dan Mastura berikrar ingin berkahwin selepas tamatnya pengajian di universiti. Namun, Fandi yang juga rakan sekelas Mastura mencemburui percintaan mereka. SPM pun tiba tetapi Mastura terlewat menghadiri ujian Matematik dan berasa amat kecewa kerana menganggap dia telah pun gagal. Kakak Mastura, Anita pula ingin Mastura mencari calon suami yang kaya. Perasaan kecewa mula menyelubungi diri Amir apabila mendapat tahu Mastura ditunangkan dengan Fandi. Mengetahui perihal sebenar mengapa mereka akan dikahwinkan, Amir membawa Mastura lari ke selatan Thailand. Bermulalah kekecohan antara mereka semua dalam sekuel kepada Gila-Gila Pengantin ini.

programme.title: Baginda
programme.desc: Diwariskan untuk mengurus sebuah kolej swasta di Johor Bahru oleh pakciknya, Azian terpaksa melalui pelbagai cabaran untuk menaikkan semula martabat sekolah yang sudah merudum prestasinya itu. Hampir sahaja putus asa namun sikap dedikasinya untuk mendidik anak bangsa membuatkan Azian ingin terus menjalankan amanah pakciknya.

programme.title: Bukan Cinta Malaikat
programme.desc: Reyhan, seorang sukarelawan Muslim Care yang berasal dari Bandung jatuh hati kepada gadis Malaysia bernama Dewi sejak dia menyelamatkan Dewi daripada satu insiden ketika mereka berada di Madinah. Walau bagaimanapun, cinta Reyhan itu terhalang apabila Dewi mempunyai kekasih bernama Adam. Dalam masa yang sama, seorang gadis bernama Aliyah pula menaruh hati kepada Reyhan.

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Tania, seorang wartawan menjalankan penyiasatan tentang kes pembunuhan rakannya, Johari yang menyiasat skandal syarikat kewangan. Skandal tersebut melibatkan bapa Sheila. Dibantu oleh seorang jurufoto, Norman yang ingin membersihkan namanya kerana sebelum Johari mati dibunuh, terdapat pertengkaran antara mereka berdua. Mereka pun mula menyiasat punca sebenar pembunuhan Johari.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep101

programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep444
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep2829
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each other’s back.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep991
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep825826
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep667
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3369
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46034604
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10531054
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1807
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Monday (M)(repeat) Ep5
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2028
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep392
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again…

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kong’s Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow 2018
programme.desc: In this remake of John Woo's legendary heroic bloodshed movie, a former drug smuggler attempts to start his life anew and repair his relationship with his estranged brother, who is a rising star in the Police Narcotics Division.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily’s Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: Former SWAT captain Dong Gu suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: This is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: Defying Chase
programme.desc: A stunt man is inadvertently caught in a criminal operation involving culture relics hustling, and has to fight for himself in a series of dangerous adventures.

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly man’s spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This movie is inspired by the true story of real-life hero Huo Yuan Jia. When a fight destroys the reputation of this renowned martial arts champion along with the lives of his family, Huo’s path to redemption brings him face-to-face with the most ferocious opponents in the world.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb…

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack…

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Hello Mr. Billionaire
programme.desc: An incompetent soccer goalkeeper for a minor league suddenly inherits thirty billion yuan in this mind-boggling comedy. In order to get the full amount, he must first spend one billion yuan on himself in a month without telling anyone about the task, and is also not allowed to own any assets at the end of it.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fiancé left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: Golden Chickensss
programme.desc: Ah Kam is now a mama-san leading a team of young prostitutes to service the rich and famous, and she always aims to fulfil every client’s needs. When Ah Kam’s ex-lover, a triad boss, encounters difficulties adapting to a new Hong Kong after his release from a long imprisonment, she helps him get back on his feet to lead a normal life.

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Popular make-up artist Sammy is hired as the CEO of a cosmetics company with all women staff. As he is clueless with women, he invites Arnold, a fellow make-up artist, to join and help him. Though Arnold might appear to be a woman's magnet, his heart still lingers with his first love, Mona.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killer’s mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened…

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: “In the Mood for Love” is Wong Kar-Wai’s most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses are having an affair.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu serves his triad society loyally and tries to live a respectable life, but over time his good intentions lead him to an all-out gang war with a startling conclusion.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend’s baby...

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the general’s escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fung’s life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: When the Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: Raw Courage
programme.desc: After the Ming Emperor is overthrown and his infant son was put in the care of the Black Dragon Society, a traitorous martial arts clan attacks the society, forcing an inexperienced pair of swordsman and swordswoman to flee with the infant. Their journey to deliver the infant to safety is filled with dangers that would require help from other allies…

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Emperor and his Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlong’s younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles…

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern – an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all…

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent’s consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her…

programme.title: Ambitious Kung Fu Girl
programme.desc: The lovely Michelle Mei Suet plays a spoiled girl Szu-szu who ignores her true love Yang Fan (Yuan Te) to go off in search of a swordsman Chin Ko (Chen Kuan-tai) she idolizes. The search sets off one great action scene after another, until she's threatened to be sold into slavery but Yang Fan arrives in the nick of time! This amusing and entertaining variation on the standard kung-fu film is definitely a winner.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy “House of 72 tenants”, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: The heroine Yu Fei Xia is accused of stealing the book of martial arts secrets. To prove her innocence, she disguises herself as a man and finds her way into the Shaolin Temple to find out the truth...

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu’s until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: In The Sword And The Lute, Kwei Wu (Jimmy Wang Yu) and his partner (Chin Ping) are on a mission to destroy the "Phoenix Lute", a deadly weapon that shoots poisonous needles up to 500 paces and which can only be destroyed by the Kan curved sword...

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him…

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Martial Arts of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers’ death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor’s death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: A heroic family is double crossed and massacred on the battle field with only two of the brothers surviving the slaughter. One of the brothers (Gordon Liu), escapes to a Shaolin temple where his bloodlust and thirst for vengeance puts him at odds with the monks. When he discovers his sister is captured by the same villains who destroyed his family he leaves the monastery in an attempt to rescue her and avenge what has come upon his family.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers’ claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again…

programme.title: Maragadha Naanayam
programme.desc: Tamil Fantasy Comedy Film, Starring, Aadhi, Nikki Galrani, Anandaraj, Ramdoss & Daniel Annie Pope

programme.title: Irumugan
programme.desc: Irumugan features Actor Vikram, Actress Nayanthara & Actress Nithya Menon. Iru Mugan is a science fiction action thriller film written and directed by Anand Shankar. The story revolves around a RAW agent couple (Vikram & Nayantara) and an evil minded scientist named Love. One of the Blockbuster Hit movie in 2016

programme.desc: Tamil Comedy Film, Starring, Vimal, Bindu Madhavi, Soori, Singampuli & Ravi Maria

programme.desc: Tamil Biographical Sports Drama Film, Starring, Aamir Khan, Fatima Sana Shaikh, Sanya Malhotra, Zaira Wasim, Sakshi Tanwar & Others

programme.title: The Great (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Dickhead - Catherine, Orlo and Velementov begin their rule of Russia and unexpected obstacles appear. Peter is on a journey of self-improvement under house arrest.

programme.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Children of the Comet - While on a survey mission, the U.S.S. Enterprise discovers a comet is going to strike an inhabited planet. They try to re-route the comet, only to find an ancient alien relic buried on the its icy surface.

programme.title: For Emma & Ever
programme.desc: Emma, a wedding registrar, is unhappily married. When a former lover, Ben, re-appears in her life with a fiancée in tow, she’s taken a back. Long buried emotions come flooding back, and Emma is faced with a difficult decision to make.

programme.title: Sofia
programme.desc: In Morocco, sex outside marriage is punishable by up to 12 months in prison. But when unmarried Sofia gives birth, her family’s biggest fear is not her going to jail, it’s preserving their honour.

programme.title: Lessons of a Dream
programme.desc: Koch, a young Englishman teacher, tries to change a strict German boys school’s archaic ways and prejudiced views of the English with unconventional methods. A battle ensues between his detractors who want him out and his students who adore him.

programme.title: The Gold Diggers
programme.desc: Annabel seduces married men and blackmails them for cash. But what goes around comes around, and she ends up getting cheated by another con artist, Tom. When the perfect targets appear for both to win big, a war begins – but so does an unexpected love.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: Don't Mess With Klara
programme.desc: Klara is a gifted cyber-agent who enjoys keeping both her professional and personal life under strict control. When her boyfriend suddenly breaks up with her for a new girl, she uses her skills to sabotage their relationship with hilarious consequences.

programme.title: We Look The Same
programme.desc: In this witty short about racial and culture crises, a French-born Chinese store assistant is faced with a conundrum. A Chinese tourist needs to use the store’s restroom but that’s against the rules. Is compassion worth the risk of losing one’s job?

programme.title: Galloping Mind
programme.desc: A pair of twins are separated at birth and meet again twelve years later. Attracted by a nebulous bond, they begin an exciting journey of their roots and become destined for a brutal confrontation with their past.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Fire Devil Of Vienna
programme.desc: The charred remains of the principal of a boarding school is found. Blind ex-cop Haller goes undercover to infiltrate the community and tries to discover its dark secrets. To make things more complicated, he unexpectedly falls for his beautiful co-worker.

programme.title: My Father's Bike
programme.desc: When Włodek’s wife suddenly leaves him for another man, the 70-year-old man has a heart attack. His son and grandson visit him, and the inter-generational trio embarks on a long journey to find her. They address past grievances and create new memories.

programme.title: Sofia
programme.desc: In Morocco, sex outside marriage is punishable by up to 12 months in prison. But when unmarried Sofia gives birth, her family’s biggest fear is not her going to jail, it’s preserving their honour.

programme.title: The Furlough
programme.desc: Four inmates with vastly different convictions are granted a 48 hours furlough. Some seek to redeem failed relationships while others search for vengeance. But above it all, each of them seeks to reclaim their dignity and lust for life once again.

programme.title: Love In Bangkok
programme.desc: Architect Laura Brunel is sent to Bangkok to create plans for a mall. She meets Marc, a manager of an NGO that runs orphanages, and falls in love with him. However, she must tell him that her project will involve the destruction of the local orphanage.

programme.title: Picket Fences
programme.desc: Kenan, a reclusive Turkish widower, lives beside Lissi, a happy-go-lucky landlady. Both rarely see eye to eye with one another. But when Kenan’s kids embark on a mission to get their father a new woman, things take an unexpected comedic turn.

programme.title: Galloping Mind
programme.desc: A pair of twins are separated at birth and meet again twelve years later. Attracted by a nebulous bond, they begin an exciting journey of their roots and become destined for a brutal confrontation with their past.

programme.title: Mom Or Dad?
programme.desc: After years of marriage, Valeria and Nicola decide to amicably divorce. However, when both receive lucrative job offers abroad, each tries to avoid having custody of the kids by fashioning themselves as a bad parent. A hilarious war of tricks ensues.

programme.title: The Wedding Misplanner
programme.desc: Two in-laws have clashing ideas on the best wedding arrangement for their engaged children. Claudia, the groom’s mother, wants a small intimate affair while Herb, the bride’s father, wants a pompous ceremony. Peace is shattered, and all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: Kidz
programme.desc: Sara and Nicola are married and in love. Their lives seem to be perfect: they have an angelic six-year-old daughter, thriving careers and a stable marriage. The birth of their second child, which disrupts the family balance, leads to tragicomic scenarios.

programme.title: The Furlough
programme.desc: Four inmates with vastly different convictions are granted a 48 hours furlough. Some seek to redeem failed relationships while others search for vengeance. But above it all, each of them seeks to reclaim their dignity and lust for life once again.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Childhood friends, Nina and Hugo chose different paths in life. Years later, Hugo returns to his hometown unbeknownst to him, the day before Nina's wedding. Events on the wedding day throw them back together and they embark on a new adventure.

programme.desc: Inspired by true stories, this thriller covers two grisly crime cases. A young waitress disappears and is held captive by a psychotic doctor. Meanwhile, the head of intelligence of Transnistria defects to the West and leaves a trail of blood behind him.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Based on true stories retold by Palestinian refugees, this animation focuses on 11 year-old Wardi’s life in a Lebanese camp. One day, her beloved great-grandfather entrusts her with his most prized possession – the key to their ancestral house in Galilea.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: When a Palestinian girl disappears, the Australian media jumps on the news like vultures. She is painted as an Islamic extremist who has joined ISIS. Her family vehemently denies the accusations as they struggle to cope with their grief and confusion.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Childhood friends, Nina and Hugo chose different paths in life. Years later, Hugo returns to his hometown unbeknownst to him, the day before Nina's wedding. Events on the wedding day throw them back together and they embark on a new adventure.

programme.title: DNA Ep1
programme.desc: When a little girl disappears in Copenhagen, forensic clues point to a kidnapper in Poland. Inspector Rolf travels there with an unlikely partner – his baby daughter. But tragedy strikes when his daughter suddenly disappears from her pram on the ferry.

programme.title: DNA Ep2
programme.desc: Inspector Rolf tries to find a car thief by matching DNA to possible suspects. His assistant Neel discovers that the thief isn’t on the registry and this prompts Rolf to reflect on the unsolved disappearance of his own baby daughter 5 years ago.

programme.title: To Live To Sing
programme.desc: Zhao Li is the manager of a small Sichuan Opera troupe. When their theater risks getting demolished, she desperately tries to find a new venue. Soon, the line between her bleak reality and the colorful fantasy of opera starts to magically blur.

programme.title: Kuessipan
programme.desc: Growing up together as best friends in an Innu community, Shaniss and Mikuan’s friendship is put to the test when Mikuan falls in love with a white boy and dreams of leaving the reserve they grew up in.

programme.title: Hacker
programme.desc: Benjamin is a 13-year-old orphan and hacking enthusiast. One day, he discovers that, contrary to what he was told, his mother didn’t die in an accident years ago. In his conquest to locate her, he provokes the ire of the Danish Secret Service.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 24
programme.desc: Sean takes the bidders to the home of the L.A. County Fair for a behind the scenes tour. In a location that was built in 1922, there's no telling what might be up for auction. Who will win big underneath the grandstands?

programme.title: Friends S9 16
programme.desc: Phoebe asks her boyfriend, Mike (PAUL RUDD), to move in with her, but coming so close to married life might cause trouble in their relationship.

programme.title: Friends S9 17
programme.desc: When Chandler jokingly posts an outrageous biography about Ross on Ross' college alumni Web site, Ross retaliates by finding Chandler's alumni site and doing the same about Chandler.

programme.title: Friends S9 18
programme.desc: Hoping to win a huge jackpot, the friends pool their money. However, they bicker over how to spend the fortune if they win.

programme.title: Friends S9 19
programme.desc: Joey rehearses with Rachel. Later, she observes the taping of the emotional scene and has a surprising dream that night about Joey.

programme.title: Friends S9 20
programme.desc: Ross is excited when he meets fellow paleontology professor Charlie Wheeler (AISHA TYLER).

programme.title: Gotham S1 16
programme.desc: Gordon takes Dr. Thompkins to the circus, but the day turns quickly when the circus comes under attack. Then, Falcone enlists Butch Gilzean to help Penguin with the nightclub.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 1
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q hit some bad reception while working a desk and then head to a park to ask strangers for advice on their questionable life choices. Plus, the loser goes to a water aerobics class, but ends up drowning in shame.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 2
programme.desc: Q, Sal, Murr and Joe use a two-way mirror to get each other to crack and then hit a grocery to see who can sell the most samples. Plus, the loser gets taken for a ride that ends with a visit to the Statue of Liberty.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 3
programme.desc: Sal, Joe, Murr and Q get stuck in a grocery showdown, beg strangers for questionable quotes, and spew financial tips that are anything but sound. Plus, the loser earns a time-out for his outrageous antics at a kid's play space.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 4
programme.desc: Murr, Sal, Q and Joe serve up the goods posing as trainees at a juice bar and plead with strangers to get things untangled. Plus, the big loser confronts his biggest fear in a punishment that leaves him practically catatonic.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 5
programme.desc: Sal, Joe, Murr and Q act frosty while working the ice cream counter, then take Joe's dogs for a romp in the park with help from some strangers. Later, the loser watches his blood boil while performing with a góspel choir.

programme.title: Stargirl S3 9
programme.desc: After a recent experience renews Courtney’s confidence, she sets out to make amends with those around her. Jakeem puts his foot down after Mike shares his latest plan.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 16
programme.desc: The guys try to crash Wil Wheaton's celebrity Dungeons & Dragons game involving WILLIAM SHATNER, JOE MANGANIELLO, KAREEM ABDUL-JABBAR and KEVIN SMITH.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S6 18
programme.desc: Sheldon wants to search for life on other planets and Mandy answers Georgie’s marriage proposal. Also, Missy is caught between two friends.

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: The Wolf of Wall Street's Jonah Hill and Whiplash's Miles Teller star in this dramedy based on a true story that follows two twenty-something Miami stoners who exploit a little-known government initiative during the Iraq War that allows small businesses to bid on U.S. Military contracts. Starting small, they begin raking in big money and are soon living the high life. But the pair gets in over their heads when they land a $300 million deal to arm the Afghan Military -- a deal that puts them in business with some very shady people, not the least of which turns out to be the U.S. Government. Comedy powerhouse Todd Phillips (The Hangover films) writes, directs and produces (with Bradley Cooper) this incredible true story based on a controversial Rolling Stone article.

programme.title: Music And Lyrics
programme.desc: Hugh Grant and Drew Barrymore star as washed-up '80s pop star with a chance for a comeback and his quirky plant lady with a knack for lyrics. Alex Fletcher (Grant--Two Weeks Notice) has been reduced to working the nostalgia circuit at county fairs and amusement parks. The charismatic and talented musician gets a chance at a comeback when reigning pop diva Cora Corman (Haley Bennett) invites him to write and record a duet with her, but there's a problem--Alex hasn't written a song in years; he's never written lyrics . . . and he has to come up with a hit in a matter of days. Enter Sophie Fisher (Barrymore--Lucky You), Alex's beguilingly plant lady, whose flair for words strikes a chord with the struggling songwriter. On the rebound from a bad relationship with the newly famous novelist Sloan Cates (Campbell Scott--Duma), Sophie is reluctant to collaborate with anyone, especially commitment-phobe Alex. Now, Alex and Sophie will have to face their fears--and the music--to find the love and success they both deserve. Written and directed by Marc Lawrence, the writer of the Miss Congeniality films and the writer/director of Two Weeks Notice.

programme.title: Aquaman (2018)
programme.desc: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, the city of Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people -- and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Aquaman, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne. With help from royal counselor Vulko, Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan and embrace his destiny as protector of the deep.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: As a young boy, Bruce Wayne watched in horror as his millionaire parents were slain in front of him – a trauma that leads him to become obsessed with revenge. But the opportunity to avenge his parents' deaths is cruelly taken away from him by fate. Fleeing to the East, where he seeks counsel with the dangerous but honorable ninja cult leader known as Ra's Al-Ghul, Bruce returns to his now decaying Gotham City, which is overrun by organized crime and other dangerous individuals manipulating the system. Meanwhile, Bruce is slowly being swindled out of Wayne Industries, the company he inherited. The discovery of a cave under his mansion, along with a prototype armored suit, leads him to assume a new persona, one which will strike fear into the hearts of men who do wrong; he becomes Batman!!!

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep12
programme.desc: Birthday Girls, The-A pregnant cow with a shrapnel injury is brought into the M*A*S*H unit by her owner for her delivery. Hot Lips celebrates her birthday by going to Tokyo for a date with a General. In Hot Lips’ absence, Charles instructs the nurses on proper use of a drug, which he does in exchange for a classical record. When complications arise for the pregnant cow, Levophed, a new drug, makes the delivery possible. Charles, being the authority on the use of the drug, must demonstrate on the cow while the nurses watch; he is less than thrilled about the operation. Klinger’s jeep breaks down and Hot Lips is unable to get to the airport for her birthday trip. Klinger later starts a betting pool on the birth of the calf.

programme.desc: Wild Boy - Part 1-A traveling sideshow, run by Dr. Joshua McQueen, features the “Wild Boy of the North” as its main attraction.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Doogie the Red Nosed Reindeer-It is Christmas Eve. The exhausted medical staff are working overtime in the E.R., where Paul, a nicely dressed but shoeless man, is brought in. He is in a confused state and thinks he is Darth Vader.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep12
programme.desc: Birthday Girls, The-A pregnant cow with a shrapnel injury is brought into the M*A*S*H unit by her owner for her delivery. Hot Lips celebrates her birthday by going to Tokyo for a date with a General. In Hot Lips’ absence, Charles instructs the nurses on proper use of a drug, which he does in exchange for a classical record. When complications arise for the pregnant cow, Levophed, a new drug, makes the delivery possible. Charles, being the authority on the use of the drug, must demonstrate on the cow while the nurses watch; he is less than thrilled about the operation. Klinger’s jeep breaks down and Hot Lips is unable to get to the airport for her birthday trip. Klinger later starts a betting pool on the birth of the calf.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 Ep11
programme.desc: Angels On Campus-When two girls from Tiffany's sorority disappear, the Angels find themselves back in college trying to unravel a suspected white slavery ring.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S5 Ep05
programme.desc: Lucy and John Wayne-John Wayne, who's never lost a movie battle yet, comes perilously close to it when Lucy barges onto the set where he's making his newest western.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S1 Ep06
programme.desc: Diamonds Are a Man’s Best Friend-The Grace Brothers staff are not pleased with the meagre contents of their wage packets. So when a customer loses a diamond in the store, the offer of a reward brings out the downright deviousness in them all.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep07
programme.desc: Wild Boy - Part 2-Matthew’s life has taken a complete turn, thanks to the love and support of so many people in Walnut Grove, and he is now living happily with Mr. Edwards.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep08
programme.desc: Return Of Nellie-The Oleson’s are thrilled to learn that Nellie is returning home for a visit, but Nancy is not pleased about sharing the spotlight.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Greed is Good-At the persuasion of Vinnie, Doogie participates as a contestant on “High IQ”, a game show for geniuses. At the hospital, Joe E. Dunn is admitted, complaining of decreased vision.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Yesterday Died and Tomorrow Won't Be Born-When Steve McGarrett is injured by an unknown assailant and hospitalized, Danny Williams takes over the Five-O and starts a desperate search for clues. While doctors continue their fight to save McGarrett's life, the Five-O staff methodically and painstakingly go over his near and far past.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep12
programme.desc: Birthday Girls, The-A pregnant cow with a shrapnel injury is brought into the M*A*S*H unit by her owner for her delivery. Hot Lips celebrates her birthday by going to Tokyo for a date with a General. In Hot Lips’ absence, Charles instructs the nurses on proper use of a drug, which he does in exchange for a classical record. Klinger’s jeep breaks down and Hot Lips is unable to get to the airport for her birthday trip. Klinger later starts a betting pool on the birth of the calf.

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes Ep02
programme.desc: The Dying Detective-Holmes gets a visit from Adelaide Savage who is worried about her husband Victor's increasing habit of smoking opium to heighten his powers for writing poetry.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S5 Ep06
programme.desc: Lucy and the Monkey-Mary Jane, Lucy's best friend, keeps telling Lucy she's working much too hard and unless she quits will become subject to hallucinations.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep13
programme.desc: Blood and Guts-Clayton Kibbee, a handsome, worldly and renowned war correspondent, arrives at the 4077th with the intent of doing a story on the six pints of blood donated to the war effort by some of his readers. Kibbee decides to fictionalize the story of the first pint of blood in order to enliven it. When Hawkeye overhears what is going on he is livid, and points out that this is not a glorious escapade. When the fighting moves and the flow of casualties is lessened, a drunken Kibbe steals B.J.’s newly restored motorcycle and takes his remaining pints of blood with him in search of more battling and perhaps a more dramatic story for the wire. Kibbee crashes during his alcoholic haze and is so severely injured as to need a pint of his own blood. The irony of the situation is not lost on the unfortunate journalist.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep16
programme.desc: The Reluctant Dragon-Dan Briggs sends Rollin Hand and Barney behind the Iron Curtain to help a scientist escape to the West and rejoin his wife, who has recently escaped, in "The Reluctant Dragon"

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 Ep12
programme.desc: Angel Hunt-The Angels are lured to Diablo Island by an old enemy of Charlie's who plans to hunt them down and kill them to avenge himself on their boss.

programme.desc: The Clock-Mr Grainger's colleagues plan a birthday dinner to mark his long service in the store.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep10
programme.desc: Love Story-Laura’s childhood friend, Jane Canfield, comes back to Walnut Grove. Despite being blind, she develops a fondness for Isaiah Edwards (who is twice her age) and the two fall in love. Jane’s vision is restored when she receives eye surgery. Isaiah is hopeful about building a future with her, but negative input from his friends turn this into one of the most difficult decisions of his life.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Attack of the Green-Eyed Monster-Wanda becomes jealous when Doogie runs into—and is recognized by—Krista, a beautiful blonde whose shapely leg he had operated on. She invites him to a sorority party at UCLA as Wanda storms off.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep14
programme.desc: Holy Mess, A-A depressed soldier goes AWOL and ends up at the 4077th in the company of Hawkeye and B.J. They discover that the soldier, Gillis, had just found out his wife was having an affair and acted impetuously. The next morning they take him to Sunday service to talk to Father Mulcahy. When the M.P.s come to arrest Gillis, Father Mulcahy extends him sanctuary. When Potter informs Gillis that the Command Chaplain has decreed that the sanctuary is to be denied in this situation, Gillis pulls a gun, only to be disarmed by a soft-spoken Father Mulcahy.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S10 Ep130
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep1
programme.desc: Pilot: Catfish - When Harvard philosophy scholar Jack Griffin finds himself teaching high school in Toledo, he tosses the syllabus and recruits his students to help mentally break his dream-job-stealing nemesis Miles Leonard.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep2
programme.desc: Teacher Jail - Despite his love of teacher jail where he's paid to not teach, Jack betrays the boisterous union rep who got him there in favor of Principal Durbin.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep3
programme.desc: Overachieving Virgins - While Principal Durbin struggles with budget cuts, Jack discovers his students pity him so he rallies, making a splash at the school bake sale and getting kicked out of the bookstore for life.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep1
programme.desc: Inauguration - Picking up one year after the events of the final episode of "The Good Wife," an enormous financial scam has destroyed the reputation of a young lawyer, Maia Rindell, while simultaneously wiping out her mentor and godmother Diane Lockhart's savings. Forced out of Lockhart & Lee, they join Lucca Quinn at one of Chicago's preeminent law firms.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep2
programme.desc: First Week - Diane raises eyebrows while settling in as a new partner at Reddick, Boseman & Kolstad. Maia continues to deal with the repercussions of her family's Ponzi scheme. Lucca and Maia unexpectedly pick up a new case.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep3
programme.desc: The Schtup List - Adrian and Barbara face a cruel realization about a high profile client. While second chair to Diane on a case, Lucca is in for more than she bargained for thanks to the state’s attorney’s office’s golden boy, Colin Morello. Maia visits her father in prison.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep4
programme.desc: Henceforth Known As Property - Diane and Lucca represent an ovarian cancer survivor looking to obtain custody of her previously donated embryos. Maia is the victim of a fake social media account. Mike Kresteva pays a visit to Reddick, Boseman & Kolstad.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep5
programme.desc: Stoppable: Requiem For An Airdate - Lucca defends a TV writer-producer in a copyright infringement case with ties to the President of the United States. Mike Kresteva takes aim at Reddick, Boseman & Kolstad. Carrie Preston, Matthew Perry and John Benjamin Hickey guest star.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep6
programme.desc: Social Media And Its Discontents - After landing tech mogul Neil Gross as a new client, the firm is tasked with figuring out a way to combat hate speech on his social media platform. Maia’s suspicions about her father grow after Uncle Jax pays an unwelcome visit. Lucca and Colin’s romance heats up.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep7
programme.desc: Not So Grand Jury - Mike Kresteva takes his case against Reddick, Boseman & Kolstad to a grand jury, but the firm devises a grand jury strategy of their own to hamper Kresteva’s efforts. Colin finds himself in an awkward position in court.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep8
programme.desc: Reddick Vs Boseman - Founding partner, Carl Reddick, makes a surprise return to the firm. A renowned local pastor needs the firm’s help in a legal matter that threatens to ruin his legacy. Lucca unexpectedly meets Colin’s parents. Meanwhile, Henry attempts to reconnect with Maia.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep9
programme.desc: Self Condemned - Diane and Adrian find themselves involved in another police brutality case, this time representing a surprising but familiar face, Colin Sweeney. Lucca represents Maia for her interview with a federal investigator seeking information on the Rindell scandal.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep10
programme.desc: Chaos - Season finale. Diane takes on a new client who is accused of cyber-terrorism, resulting in unforeseen repercussions for the firm, especially Lucca. An accident brings Diane and Kurt together. Henry reveals new truths about the scandal to Maia.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A successful sports agent, fired for being honorable, fights for his ideals and those who depend on him.

programme.title: Seven Pounds
programme.desc: The emotional story of a man who will change the lives of seven strangers.

programme.desc: The Angels investigate a series of murders which occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database.

programme.title: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Once-incarcerated Marcus Cowans is trying to turn over a new leaf with the support of his loving family. Upon discovering that one of his brothers may have been involved in a horrific crime, Marcus grapples with the limits of brotherhood and loyalty.

programme.title: Kickboxer
programme.desc: After kickboxing champ Eric Sloane (Dennis Alexio) is crippled in the ring by the evil Tong Po, Eric's younger brother, Kurt (Jean Claude Van Damme), seeks vengeance.

programme.title: Sliver
programme.desc: A literary agent's life seems to take a turn for the better when she moves into a new apartment and develops a romance but as the history of the building and its occupants unfolds, she is plunged into a terrifying nightmare of high-tech voyeurism and murder.

programme.title: Horsemen
programme.desc: A detective is investigates a series of murders that are based on the biblical prophecies concerning the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse—War, Famine, Pestilence, and Death—and discovers a terrifying link between himself and the suspects.

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: James Dial, once a top CIA assassin and now retired, is called back by the CIA to kill a terrorist leader in London. But Dial learns that once his mission is accomplished, he will be next on the hit list, to remove any traces of American involvement.

programme.desc: The Food Delivery App - Hannah Fry tucks into the tech behind food delivery apps, which are now used by 24 million people in the UK. Hannah finds out how pizza made us fall in love with the internet.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Yukon - The Yukon is a river of beauty and dangerous extremes - a place where the 'call of the wild' is still strong. Home to grizzlies, moose and salmon, it lies at the heart of a vast northern wilderness.

programme.title: Turkey with Simon Reeve (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Taurus Mountains to Istanbul - In the Taurus Mountains, Simon stays with descendants of the original Turks, nomads known as Yoruks, whose lifestyle is under threat from the modern world and an increasingly Islamic government.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle (S9) Ep8
programme.desc: Sierra Nevada - Ben visits snowboarding legend Mike Basich, who left professional sport to reconnect with nature in the Sierra Nevada mountains.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: Cuba - Alongside Cuban fishermen Robson searches for sardines, tarpons, bonefish, barracudas and grouper fish.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Realm of the Bear - Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Realm of the Wolf - In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Out of the Darkness - Winter releases her iron grip. In Iceland Arctic foxes scurry across mountains to mate. In Shetland an otter raises her cubs. In Norway a vast reindeer herd descends to the calving grounds. A huge March storm rages across the Stormborn lands.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return of the Light - Arctic foxes raise cubs on Iceland’s volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Children of the Storm - In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Cold-Blooded Killers - From our point of view, cold-blooded predators are brutal, savvy, programmed killers. But from their point of view, it’s just another day at the butcher’s counter. These are some of the most fearsome predators on Earth.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Land of Extremes - This episode visually illustrates how the Arctic, locked in darkness for nearly seven months, springs to life once the sun rises above the horizon. We explore ideas of migration, hibernation, the food web and habitat change, and are introduced to some of the Arctic’s most magnificent and iconic creatures and its most dramatic landscapes.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Devon Island - Land of Ice - Devon Island is the largest uninhabited island in the world. It’s so remote and forbidding that when scientists wanted to simulate living conditions on Mars, they chose Devon. Devon’s barren landscape only supports the hardiest of plants and few animals.

programme.title: In for the Kill
programme.desc: In for the Kill - Marvel at the clever ways predators use cunning, agility, and breakneck speed when taking down prey. Witness luring behaviours and see how some killers hide in plain sight, while others put weaponry or chemical warfare to work to bring dinner home.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Realm of the Bear - Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Gardens in the Clouds - The ancient plants and animals of the Cloud Mountains of South Africa have long captured people’s imagination. It’s a landscape defined by weather and threatened by invaders. But these mountains are not only a sanctuary for life in the present; they also offer a fascinating window into our past.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Masters of Defence - Staying alive is job one for these masters of defence. With clever adaptations like mimicry and poison on their side, they continue to outwit predators.

programme.desc: In for the Kill - Marvel at the clever ways predators use cunning, agility, and breakneck speed when taking down prey. Witness luring behaviours and see how some killers hide in plain sight, while others put weaponry or chemical warfare to work to bring dinner home.

programme.desc: Out of the Darkness - Winter releases her iron grip. In Iceland Arctic foxes scurry across mountains to mate. In Shetland an otter raises her cubs. In Norway a vast reindeer herd descends to the calving grounds. A huge March storm rages across the Stormborn lands.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return of the Light - Arctic foxes raise cubs on Iceland’s volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Children of the Storm - In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Water Warriors - From powerful sharks to mysterious and beautiful fish shoals, the underwater dynamic between predator and prey continues. Evolution is on display in these clever creatures as they use all their skills to survive.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Isle Royale - Since the 1900s, this uninhabited island in Lake Superior has been a constant battleground between moose and wolves. Scientists have been watching closely since 1953, making it one of the oldest research projects in the country. We go with lead researcher Rolf Peterson as he gets a band of volunteers to scour the island for moose bones, trying to piece together population numbers after a long winter.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wild Fortresses - In New Zealand, two wild fortresses protect the vulnerable native animals: One a remote island protected by a moat of saltwater, the other a hilltop citadel surrounded by a predator-proof barrier. This is the story of these delicate sanctuaries and the life that thrives within them.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Woodland Troop - In this small patch of woodland, two young monkeys face the toughest time of their lives. As they find their place in the world, they must learn which neighbors are allies, and which are foes. Who to trust, and who to avoid. They will suffer loss, and gain friends, as they discover what it means to be part of the Woodland Troop.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Great Divide - Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Realm of the Bear - Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible World - Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we can’t see, sound we can’t hear and even stranger forces we can’t begin to detect.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep1
programme.desc: City of Riches - Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Great Divide - Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Realm of the Bear - Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Family - Every empire needs a succession plan. Making babies – and raising them – is crucial for every species to survive. In some social circles, it takes a village to raise a family. In others, a single parent is all that stands between the vulnerability of youth and the threats of the wild.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.desc: Family - Every empire needs a succession plan. Making babies – and raising them – is crucial for every species to survive. In some social circles, it takes a village to raise a family. In others, a single parent is all that stands between the vulnerability of youth and the threats of the wild.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Invaders from the Deep - As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest invaders around. They've thus far made their way up America's waterways, snaking up the Illinois river, eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations and their food supplies.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Goby Effect - The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like it's finally working - thanks to the round goby. Grad student Lizzy Mack is heading out on day trips to catch bucket loads of the snakes, collect measurements, and inject them with small microchips to track them along their way, all while dodging bites from some of the crankiest snakes around.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ocean Legacy - Spring on New Zealand’s east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. They’ve returned to their land to breed. But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Better Together - The wilds of Zambia are a tough place to live. Here, many animals must come together in groups to help defend territory, protect offspring, find food and overcome predators.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Collisions - Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Realm of the Wolf - In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.desc: Restless Giants - Japan is going through a seismic crisis after the devastating Tsunami of 2011. We look closely at two very dangerous volcanoes; both are considered to be in the top five most dangerous on the planet.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Invisible Hideaways - In Uruguay we venture deep within the rural countryside to an area of remote forests and lakes to a one hundred hectare resort of mirrored cabins. In Sweden we visit the Kolarbyn Eco Lodge - a rustic retreat of 12 hobbit like huts that are replicas of those built in this forest by people making charcoal from as far back as the 1800s.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S20) Ep7
programme.desc: London chef Corinne plans to build a beautifully crafted, wedge-shaped home on a slither of garden down the side of the house she's lived in for 24 years.

programme.desc: Bowlero - Colie Edison, chief customer officer of Bowlero Corp and CEO of the Professional Bowlers Association, works to spare the customers from waiting too long when checking them in to bowl, and tries for a perfect game while taking food orders as a lane server.

programme.title: Donal's Family Kitchen (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Donal Skehan prepares a bacon and cabbage pasta that is a delicious dish with wonderful flavour.

programme.title: Nadiya's Food Adventure (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Wales - Nadiya heads to Wales to find out why Welsh lamb is so good, visit a rosewater distiller, and make her fennel Welsh cakes.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Together (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Taco Party - Jamie creates a super-relaxed menu and cooks up a dynamite Mexican taco night of slow-cooked pork belly with red cabbage slaw, followed by a chocolate semifreddo decked with brittle.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Marrakesh - TV chef Andi Oliver takes Fred to Marrakesh to enjoy lamb and couscous at a legendary restaurant, chicken tagine for under £10 and breakfast on a spectacular roof terrace.

programme.desc: Rocco in Naples - Gino and son Rocco head to bustling Naples - they discover incredible street food and Gino cooks up one of his mamma's favourite recipes.

programme.desc: Patisserie - Today our seven remaining bakers take on Patisserie baking.
