programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep15
programme.desc: Gimme, Gimme, Gimme: The Game - King Julien becomes so enthralled with the idea of money that he introduces it to the kingdom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep16
programme.desc: Body Double - In preparation for peace talks with the crocodiles, King Julien hires a body double to go in his place.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep17
programme.desc: Cleopatra Needs Space - Akila and Brian are having major romance drama and Cleo HAS to get away from it. She gets captured by Space Scavengers, but it’s still kind of an improvement.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep18
programme.desc: School Break - When Akila invites Cleo home for school break, she has to compete for her parents’ attention.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep15
programme.desc: Lucky And The New Governor - The girl’s plans to attend the Governor’s Ball are waylaid when they save a pregnant horse.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep16
programme.desc: Lucky And The Risky Rescue - When a Tuckapaw boy is unfairly arrested, Lucky and her friends plan to break him out of jail.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep8
programme.desc: Mom Genes - When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep28
programme.desc: Don't Worry Be Peppy / Two's A Cloud - When Poppy worries that her father doesn’t feel useful now that’s he’s no longer King, she asks her friends to bring Peppy small problems to solve. But will Peppy be able to face a real threat, in the form of a swamp monster?/When Cloud Guy moves into Branch’s bunker, Branch will do whatever it takes to get his unwanted roommate to leave- including inviting his annoying cloud parents over.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep18
programme.desc: Verry Berry Gets It Together/Fur Mountain - When Verry Berry's adventurous spirit gets her in trouble, she joins up with a colony of army ants to learn discipline. / When Twig disappears into the coat of a dog and cohabitates with a bunch of fleas, the Mighty Ones must convince him that fleas are not his friends.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep28
programme.desc: Sullen Earth - When the Mole King kidnaps Uli, Puss realizes that confidence alone isn't always enough ammunition to defeat a powerful army

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep11
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Soggy Salvation of the Swirling Sweatnami - Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep55
programme.desc: Something Rotten On Beserker Island - When the riders receive an invitation to Berserker Island for Gustav's apprenticeship graduation, they arrive to find Savage trying to take over Dagur's throne

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep56
programme.desc: Soutlouts Angels - When Snoutlout crashes on a mysterious island he comes face-to-face with the Wing Maidens and must rely on Astrid, Heather, and Ruffnut to rescue him

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep5
programme.desc: Monster Machine - The annual baby pageant approaches, but Staci’s plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep3
programme.desc: Blade of the Red Phoenix - Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep4
programme.desc: The Intruder Flies a Crooked Path - When Jindiao arrives to the Village, he invites the kids to participate in an exhibition match, but has alternative motives

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep5
programme.desc: The Case Of The Lost Space Rocket - Smartysaurus is going to launch into space in her all-new super space rocket. But as her friends all watch on the Daredale Big Screen, the picture suddenly goes dead! Noddy investigates to find out what happened to Smartysaurus.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep6
programme.desc: The Case Of The Smartysaurus's Jet Pack - Smartysaurus is trying out her new jet pack, but she hasn't read the instructions before taking off and cannot control it properly. Noddy investigates to help her control it before things get too dangerous.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep7
programme.desc: The Case Of The Topsy Turvy Trees - All is set for the Toy Green Picnic until Noddy finds some of the trees turned upside down! Was it the Ninjas climbing on them? Or the Pirates wanting an upside-down tree for Pirate Bay? Noddy launches an investigation to find out who's behind all this.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep8
programme.desc: The Case Of The Golden Thing - The Knights have found a mysterious Golden Thing. But the Pirates insist it's their Golden Thing. Noddy tries to settle the argument by investigating: Who is the owner of the Golden Thing? He soon finds more and more Golden Things have been hidden all over Toyland.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep31
programme.desc: Catch Me If You Can - All the animals are having a nap. But Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo aren't tired and want to play… will they have enough energy to last until everyone else wakes up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep32
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Whistle Worries - Raa Raa is determined that he can copy all the noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle… until he hears Topsy whistling. Try as he might, Raa Raa just can't whistle. All his jungle friends help Raa Raa to learn to whistle.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep33
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Hiccups - Raa Raa can't get rid of his hiccups. Can his friends help him?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep34
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo's Wriggly Jiggly Game - Topsy is having a party and Raa Raa is helping organise the games. But not everybody is good at them. Can Raa Raa and his friends come up with new games that all the friends are good at and enjoy?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep5
programme.desc: Car Boot Sale - Big Chris has a clear out and takes all his old junk up to Farmer Green's car boot sale but misses the clutter in Rusty. How will he get everything back?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep6
programme.desc: Hot Stuff - Big Chris takes the cars to the beach to relax in the heat but he is so busy dealing with the cars he forgets to drink his water. But hang on, who else has drunk it…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep7
programme.desc: Law And Order - Mr Carburettor is fed up with the cars running amok on his track and summons Bill and Nick to restore order to the track. But might our overzealous policeman overstep the mark?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep8
programme.desc: Flash's Tea Party - Flash invites everyone to a tea party, thinking they bring the food with them. Are there going to be a lot of hungry bunnies at Silver hatch?

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep3
programme.desc: Bully For You / The Ra Animator - Bully For You When Casper decides he can't take any more of Thatch's nastiness, he forms a secret squad dedicated to putting an end to bullying. The Ra-minator Using the power of invisibility, Casper offers to help transform Ra from a sports zero to an athletic hero.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep4
programme.desc: Weekend At Bunny's / Grimly Day - Weekend at Bunny's Alder and Dash sound the alarm after a terrifying creature threatens Scare School. Grimly Day It's Grimly Day?the grimmest day of the year!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months — everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep43
programme.desc: OCB - Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep73
programme.desc: Like A Fox - Puss gets jealous when Guy Fox shows up and asks Dulcinea to run off with him

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep21
programme.desc: Weekend at Diamonds / Brancheption - Guy creates a new invention, the Farty Party/When Branch is trapped in a dream by a mysterious critter called the Dream Sucker, he must find a way to escape

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep47
programme.desc: King Julien: Superstar! - Julien, Clover, Mort and Maurice become music sensations overnight, but the band breaks up over Julien and Clover's non-stop fighting

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep21
programme.desc: Lucky And The Impatient Patient - While Spirit recovers from his injuries, Lucky helps out at the soda shop.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep21
programme.desc: It's On Like Amazon! - Wally and Wenda go on a mission to return the borrowed Quick Bloom Key to its owner, an Amazon-dwelling wizard named Vinebeard. But Odlulu intercepts the key so she can use its magic for her lemonade stand. Using local trails, Wally and Wenda must track Odlulu through the jungle. They'll have to raft the Amazon and brave Odlulu's ""living"" plants to complete their mission

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome to Pawston \ Ruff Day on the Job - Tag wants to bring her new neighbor, Scooch, to the Party in the Tree. But a series of traffic jams make Tag impatient, and she keeps trying to find different ways to get to the party. Thanks to Tag’s handiness - and one of Lady Lydia’s hats - they make it to the party just in time. \ Pawston’s new canine mail carrier keeps getting chased by dogs, so Tag and Scooch have to help him deliver the mail.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome to Harmony Harbor - Ari moves in to Harmony Harbor, but notices something strange involving a group of kids, a Noodle Truck chef and her pet squirrel. / After Ari discovers the secret of Team Zenko Go, he asks to join the crew. But first he must learn the importance of teamwork.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep1
programme.desc: The Nest - When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep1
programme.desc: Case Of The Broken Crystal Memory Game - All the toys are ready to start the exciting DareDale Challenge race, which culminates in the competitors successfully completing the Crystal Memory Game in the DareDale Caves. Before the race can start everyone is disappointed to discover that the Crystal Memory Game has been broken. Whilst Clockwork Mouse gets the game mended, Noddy must investigate who broke the game so that they don't break it again. Using his investigating skills in questioning, gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet and thinking, Noddy discovers that Deltoid accidentally broke the game when he was trying to memorise the crystal sorting sequence. Clever Noddy helps Deltoid remember the sequence by remembering the shapes and they are able to finish the game together. Case Closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Amazing Eyebrows - It's the day of the Best Toy Award in Toyland and Fuse is the winner! He's very excited but when his new dressing up eyebrows that he wanted to wear to the ceremony go missing, he's devastated. It's up the Noddy to investigate who has taken the amazing eyebrows so that he can get them back to Fuse before the ceremony starts. When the banner and the cup from the Award Ceremony go missing too the finger of suspicion points at Noddy and he must use all his investigating skills to clear his name and find out who has taken the missing eyebrows and why?

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep35
programme.desc: Crazy Maze / Super Sneaks - Archibald and Sage enter an endurance race through the corn maze to end all corn mazes. / Thinking his new sneakers have made him super-fast, Archibald gets roped into delivering ice cream for a couple of new-to-town entrepreneurs.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep22
programme.desc: Baby Face Off / The Pursuit Of Wrinkliness - Thunk babysits Sandy and new baby Cliff to prove his responsible. Cliff is a jerk and keeps getting Sandy in trouble/Gran worries that Thunk isn't tough enough to survive to adulthood because he likes to hang out with old people, so she puts him through a series of toughness tests.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep21
programme.desc: Lucky And The Impatient Patient - While Spirit recovers from his injuries, Lucky helps out at the soda shop.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep21
programme.desc: I Wanna Crush Your Hand - When Lotta goes to the Crush 4U concert, she gets a chance to meet the band but makes a bad first impression and goes through great lengths for a second chance. Frufru declares that she doesn't believe in climate change and Dot sets out to change her mind.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep21
programme.desc: Packet Racket / Smack Me Down - When a shady group of bugs moves into the city selling artificial ketchup, Turbo and Shadow go undercover to expose who is behind the operation. // After Turbo is challenged to compete in an underground smack-talk contest, he must get lessons from the best insult snail there is, Burn.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep217

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Paddington Opens the City Farm - Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Blue's Big Beat Band - Josh and Blue are starting a band! As we play Blue's Clues to find out what instrument Blue will play, we form our very own house band, learn rhythms, identify tempos, and sing, tap, and clap all day long.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Song Time with Blue - It's a music filled day at the Blue's Clues house as we try to figure out what song Blue wants to sing. On the way, we help Josh & Blue identify sounds of musical instruments and help chicks from the farm with their song show.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Blue's Big Neighborhood Adventure - Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: Blue's Big City Adventure S01 Ep1
programme.desc: Blue's Big City Adventure - When Josh gets the opportunity of a lifetime to audition for Rainbow Puppy's Broadway musical, Josh and Blue skidoo to New York City where they discover the magic of music and dance and following your dreams!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep230
programme.desc: Cuckoo Clock - Daddy Pig winds up the old cuckoo clock. When a wooden cuckoo pops out singing “Cuckoo!”, Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep231
programme.desc: The Cycle Ride - Peppa and her family are going for a day’s cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she’s not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa’s friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Baddy Long Legs - Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep207

programme.desc: Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave - Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The Lost Tickets - When Mommy loses her and Baby's tickets to the big Glow-J concert, they retrace her wake to track them down.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep157
programme.desc: The Magic Trick - Anna and Christopher are amazed by Ron's magic trick! When Ron teaches Anna how to be a magician, she wants to make Christopher disappear! Christopher is transformed into a balloon and the balloon into Froga!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep158
programme.desc: Go Find it ! - Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, the 1st team who does, win the game. But the objects are not easy to gather: the sun, a rocket ship, or a house!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Strawberries - Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Swing - When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends' search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Detectives - Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super Christopher - Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep601
programme.desc: The Queen - Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep301

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep104

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Tool Duel - Gabby is the mechanic all the Monster Machines in town count on to fix them up. But when Crusher steals all her tools, Gabby needs Blaze's help to get them back!

programme.desc: Muffin in space / Fizzy Frenzy - Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.desc: Wheel of Steel - Some changes to the design of Kai's big Ferris wheel, that Sir Steel makes don't go quite the way he thought they would!

programme.desc: Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over - Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington helps to hatch an egg, but it takes ages and when it finally cracks open he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Paddington Rides a Scooteer - Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Hiccups - George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Bicycles - Daddy Pig has grown a huge pumpkin and Peppa is riding her bike, but says she wants to ride without training wheels. But soon she crashes into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S6 Ep616
programme.desc: The Big Rig Bandit! - When reckless hyena Spotty steals young elephant Eli from the savanna, Wildlife Rangers Zooli and Goby hop into their big rig to rescue him! But when the big rig chase lands Spotty and Eli in danger, it's up to the Guppies to save the day!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep320
programme.desc: Blue and Little Rainbow Riding Hood - Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Blue's Big Beat Band - Josh and Blue are starting a band! As we play Blue's Clues to find out what instrument Blue will play, we form our very own house band, learn rhythms, identify tempos, and sing, tap, and clap all day long.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Santiago's Greatest Treasure / The Golden Banana Treasure - When Bonnie Bones steals a chest of pirate treasures, Santiago learns just how much he needs his crew. // Santi and crew navigate the tricky Banana Island to save a baby monkey and its treasure from Enrique.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Under the Pirate Moon - It's a nighttime chase above and below the sea when Escarlata turns the moon into a fish.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Monday Funday - The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep214
programme.desc: Paddington Goes Green - Paddington learns all about composting thanks to Mr. Mulch, but will he grow flowers in time for Aunt Lucy?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep522
programme.desc: Spider's Web - Ew! There's a spider in the house! Mummy Pig tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep523
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep155
programme.desc: Ron's Sunburn - Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep156
programme.desc: Bubu's Portrait - Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Tickety's Big Musical Morning - Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save a Box Fort / Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill! - The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort. // When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S9 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep205
programme.desc: The wig of power / The duck who parped wolf - Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Over the rainbow / We're toast - The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave - Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep10
programme.desc: The Choreography Badge - The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Sports Life
programme.desc: Female Bull Rider Margarita Cabrera - Eight Seconds Between Life and Death - Margarita Cabrera’s passion is bull riding, a very risky sport on animals that can weigh up to a ton. It’s a battle for survival, a tightrope walk between life and death. Eight seconds, that’s how long riders need to stay in their saddle for their scores to count. Margarita takes us on her exciting journey that sees her overcome fear and inspire others.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Mongolian Rentsendorj Gantugs, the coach of a renowned high-school sumo wrestling club in Tottori, as well as Bangladeshi Shovon Majumder, an IT engineer in Nagano.

programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Origami Magic
programme.desc: Origami is magic made from a single sheet of paper. This program showcases brilliant orizuru paper cranes made by Cristian Marianciuc, an origami artist living in Romania.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Nakamura Noburo is the CEO of a prosthetics manufacturer that invented the world's first silicone rubber insole. He explains the many ways his company offers support for disability and illness.

programme.title: Learn Japanese From The News
programme.desc: We listen to a news story about a new evacuation plan unveiled by Shizuoka, Yamanashi, and Kanagawa prefectures that aims to leave no person behind in the event that Mount Fuji erupts.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Indonesian reporter Aji Rokhadi retraces the stories of Southeast Asian victims of the bombing of Hiroshima. He speaks with the children of a survivor and a Japanese woman who spent time with him.

programme.desc: This time we introduce "Kids Edutainment," which is the project for children via broadcasting and interenet distribution. We show some programs picked up from the archive of the project.

programme.desc: We meet Mongolian Rentsendorj Gantugs, the coach of a renowned high-school sumo wrestling club in Tottori, as well as Bangladeshi Shovon Majumder, an IT engineer in Nagano.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: Maminata Ouandaogo's passion for African hairstyles has helped hundreds in Japan with their natural hair. But outside her salon, she says social pressure keeps some people from embracing it.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: My Street Piano
programme.desc: Autumn colors brightened in Kyoto. On the 7th floor of a station building overlooking Kyoto tower, stands a grand piano. Watch players from all walks of life come to share their melodies.

programme.title: Learn Japanese From The News
programme.desc: We listen to a news story about a new evacuation plan unveiled by Shizuoka, Yamanashi, and Kanagawa prefectures that aims to leave no person behind in the event that Mount Fuji erupts.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Indonesian reporter Aji Rokhadi retraces the stories of Southeast Asian victims of the bombing of Hiroshima. He speaks with the children of a survivor and a Japanese woman who spent time with him.

programme.title: Hello! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: This time we introduce "Kids Edutainment," which is the project for children via broadcasting and interenet distribution. We show some programs picked up from the archive of the project.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
programme.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

programme.title: A Culture Built With Wood Hida
programme.desc: The Hida region in Gifu Prefecture has some of Japan's most extensive broadleaf forests and has been home to artisans who possess sophisticated woodworking skills, such as kigumi or wood joinery.

programme.title: Seasoning The Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today, The Iseji Route: Journey of the Soul over Passes.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC270NgannouvsGane
programme.desc: UFC 270 featured a heavyweight bout between reigning champion Francis Ngannou and interim champion Cyril Gane. Also, Brandon Moreno and Deivesion Figueiredo threw down for a third time for flyweight gold. See the main card on UFC Reloaded

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep902BlachowiczvsAdesanya
programme.desc: At UFC 259, middleweight champion Israel Adesanya stepped up in weight as he sought a second belt taking on newly minted light heavyweight champion Jan Blachowicz. See both men train and prepare for their battle for 205-pound gold

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC271AdesanyavsWhittaker2
programme.desc: UFC 271 featured a rematch between reigning middleweight champion Israel “The Last Stylebender” Adesanya and the man he claimed UFC gold from, Robert “The Reaper” Whittaker. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep3
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep8
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep8
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1003MorenovsFigueiredo3
programme.desc: UFC 270 featured the third meeting between flyweight rivals Deiveson Figueiredo and Mexican champion Brandon Moreno. Relive their incredible battle like you’ve never seen it with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2307

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Song vs. Simon
programme.desc: Prelims - With five consecutive victories, including back-to-back finishes of Raphael Assuncao and Jack Shore, Ricky Simon put himself on the fast track to a shot at the bantamweight title, but on April 29, he will have to make his case even stronger by getting past Chinese contender Song Yadong in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Winner of three of his last four, with knockouts of Julio Arce and Marlon Moraes, Song can change the direction of a fight with one punch, and he plans on letting Simon know that as soon as the Octagon door shuts

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Song vs. Simon
programme.desc: Main Event - With five consecutive victories, including back-to-back finishes of Raphael Assuncao and Jack Shore, Ricky Simon put himself on the fast track to a shot at the bantamweight title, but on April 29, he will have to make his case even stronger by getting past Chinese contender Song Yadong in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Winner of three of his last four, with knockouts of Julio Arce and Marlon Moraes, Song can change the direction of a fight with one punch, and he plans on letting Simon know that as soon as the Octagon door shuts

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Pavlovich vs. Blaydes
programme.desc: Prelims - Hoping that one more win will take them to a world title shot, Top Five heavyweight contenders Curtis Blaydes and Sergei Pavlovich have the opportunity to make that statement in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas on April 22. A swarming wrestler who has stopped Chris Daukaus and Tom Aspinall in back to back fights, Blaydes is in prime form entering his spring showdown with Russia’s Pavlovich, who has won five in a row, all by knockout, over the likes of Derrick Lewis and Tai Tuivasa

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Pavlovich vs. Blaydes
programme.desc: Main Event - Hoping that one more win will take them to a world title shot, Top Five heavyweight contenders Curtis Blaydes and Sergei Pavlovich have the opportunity to make that statement in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas on April 22. A swarming wrestler who has stopped Chris Daukaus and Tom Aspinall in back to back fights, Blaydes is in prime form entering his spring showdown with Russia’s Pavlovich, who has won five in a row, all by knockout, over the likes of Derrick Lewis and Tai Tuivasa

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC270NgannouvsGane
programme.desc: UFC 270 featured a heavyweight bout between reigning champion Francis Ngannou and interim champion Cyril Gane. Also, Brandon Moreno and Deivesion Figueiredo threw down for a third time for flyweight gold. See the main card on UFC Reloaded

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep902BlachowiczvsAdesanya
programme.desc: At UFC 259, middleweight champion Israel Adesanya stepped up in weight as he sought a second belt taking on newly minted light heavyweight champion Jan Blachowicz. See both men train and prepare for their battle for 205-pound gold

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC271AdesanyavsWhittaker2
programme.desc: UFC 271 featured a rematch between reigning middleweight champion Israel “The Last Stylebender” Adesanya and the man he claimed UFC gold from, Robert “The Reaper” Whittaker. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep4

Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
